azurerm_network_watcher_flow_log.description: Manages a Network Watcher Flow Log.

network_watcher_name.description: The name of the Network Watcher. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the Network Watcher was deployed. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

network_security_group_id.description: The ID of the Network Security Group for which to enable flow logs for. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

storage_account_id.description: The ID of the Storage Account where flow logs are stored.

enabled.description: Boolean flag to enable/disable traffic analytics.

days.description: The number of days to retain flow log records.

workspace_id.description: The resource guid of the attached workspace.

workspace_region.description: The location of the attached workspace.

workspace_resource_id.description: The resource ID of the attached workspace.

interval_in_minutes.description: How frequently service should do flow analytics in minutes.

id.description: The ID of the Network Watcher.

create.description: Used when creating the Network Watcher Flow Log.

update.description: Used when updating the Network Watcher Flow Log.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Network Watcher Flow Log.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Network Watcher Flow Log.
